faqs.a: Rates vary by season; for live pricing & availability please visit https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book and you can also send an inquiry from the same page.

faqs.q: What taxes apply and at what percentage?
faqs.a: Total tax is 13%: Sales tax 7% (Florida 6% + Okaloosa County 1% discretionary surtax) + Tourist Development Tax 6% (Okaloosa County).

faqs.q: Is travel insurance available or recommended? Through whom?
faqs.a: Yes—travel insurance is offered at checkout via Play Travel Protection and we encourage all guests to consider it.

faqs.q: Do you require a damage deposit or hold? How much and when is it released?
faqs.a: Yes—we place a $300 damage hold and release it within 48 hours after checkout pending inspection.

faqs.q: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.a: We accept major credit cards only (no ACH, PayPal, or Zelle) as this is the most secure option for both parties.

faqs.q: Can I modify or extend a reservation after booking?
faqs.a: Usually yes—subject to calendar availability and any rate differences; please reach out and we’ll do our best to help.
We offer weekly and monthly discounts depending on the season; see https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book or send an inquiry.

faqs.q: Are there any blackout dates or minimum night requirements?
faqs.a: A 3-night minimum applies and peak or holiday dates may have additional restrictions; if unsure please send an inquiry from https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book.
